Style Guide

Style Guide

This document should serve as our style guide for the ArtX web app, documenting and showing what the various typographical defaults are, and acting as a showcase for various modules used throughout the site.

Paragraphs

Testing out formatting of bold text, strong text, italic text, emphasized text, and some inline link testing to round it out. I like to drink H2O with every meal1.
